TextView.android:text: The World of Professionals is an independent international organization committed to providing a platform for Professionals in all diverse sector of industries in engaging and empowering through business and education. We are supported by leaders from all over the world to think alike and support the World of Professionals vision incorporated to bring about a change in the world through the power of individual professional background, headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.World of Professional's commitment in educating, and refining professionals have resulted to a handful of innovations, and conferences; this include the renowned Asian Networkers Convention and Expo (ANCE) now on its third year. The Asian Networkers Convention Expo, the largest Networking event in the world, is focused on maintaining the high level quality and advancement of Distributors through education and seminar. This event aims to unite the Network Marketing industry in eliminating the prejudice the common mass have in the industry.About ANCE 2013:
